Articles.Content: For some reason when ever i go to kerbol i never get heat damage. I can fly straight into it and i explode first. BTW by kerbol i mean the sun if you dont know . So can someone please tell me why because i thought it was supposed to.
Since Kerbol became more than just a light in the sky, it had been like that. It's just not (yet, I hope) implemented.
It says on the wiki that theirs an invisible wall some point above kerbol. As to why there's no heat damage, maybe they just havent implemented it yet.
